about_the_game:
Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

Italian tanks during World War II presented a mixed array of designs and performance. While some models, like the Carro Armato M13/40 and the Semovente 75/18, showcased innovative features and capable firepower, others suffered from technical issues and inadequate armor. Hindered by limited industrial capacity and a fragmented approach to tank development, Italy's tank forces faced challenges in competing with the more advanced tanks of other nations. Despite their shortcomings, Italian tanks played roles in various campaigns, particularly in North Africa and the Mediterranean theater. Their performance highlighted the complex interplay between technological limitations, strategic contexts, and battlefield effectiveness during the tumultuous years of World War II.

PACK INFO:

Puzzle Count: 15
Total Piece Count: 2,937

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Ansaldo Carro d’Assalto Modello 36 - x140
  • Captured Italian Tanks - x96
  • Carro Arnato L6/40 - x330
  • Carro Arnato M11/39 - x140
  • Carro Arnato M15/42 - x216
  • Disabled M14/41 - x96
  • Fiat M14/41 - x330
  • M11/39 Column - x140
  • M13/40 in Milan - x216
  • M13/40 Monument - x216
  • M15/42 Fording a River - x140
  • Newly Manufactured M14/41 Tanks - x96
  • P26/40 Tank - x140
  • P26/40 Tank Prototype - x216
  • Semovente 75/18 - x425
